description:
The hit video game franchise Fallout finally made the leap to live-action with Amazon‘s new series. Fans were understandably cautious, especially with how important it is for video game adaptations to adapt the source material faithfully. Fortunately, Fallout has been a hit, and it’s been announced that Amazon Prime Video has renewed it for Season [...]

The post Amazon Officially Renews ‘Fallout’ For Season 2 appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Amazon Officially Renews ‘Fallout’ For Season 2
